main_definition: Drinks refer to beverages that are consumed by people, including both alcoholic and non-alcoholic options.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A casual meeting or gathering for socializing over drinks
meanings_and_examples.example: We went to the bar to have a few drinks with friends.
After work, he usually has a couple of drinks at the local pub.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act or practice of consuming any type of liquid that is not food
meanings_and_examples.example: Drinking water throughout the day helps maintain hydration levels.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A specific quantity of a beverage, often measured for recipes or serving purposes
meanings_and_examples.example: The recipe calls for one drink (1/4 cup) of orange juice.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Alcoholic beverages consumed in larger quantities, typically at social events
meanings_and_examples.example: We had a few drinks to celebrate the end of our project.
